title: 2015), and having had regard to the matters specified in section 6(3) of that Act,
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Regulation of Lobbying Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Regulation of Lobbying Act 

2015 (Designated Public Officials) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited regulation lobbying act 2015 (designated public officials) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 january 2025

title: 2015), and having had regard to the matters specified in section 6(3) of that Act,
heading: 2. A public servant in a position specified in column (3) of the table in the
text_raw:
2. A public servant in a position specified in column (3) of the table in the 
Schedule in the public service body specified in column (2) thereof opposite the 
reference number for that public service body in column (1) thereof is prescribed 
as a designated public official for the purposes of section 6(1)(f) of the 
Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015 (No. 5 of 2015). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th August, 2024.
